name: Star Quest 2: United Galaxies, Space Sim + RTS + Racing (PC)
blurb: Space Game: 3d, stars, planets, starships, ships, tanks, action, multiplayer, strategy, co-op, dogfight, wars, citizen & military pilot

rewards.reward: Your name will be on the sponsor list of the game site.\r\nReceive the digital newsletter and progress updates.\r\nGet 100 times your pledge in in-game credits (to buy items, upgrades).  e.g. $6 will give you 600 in-game credits.
